casebody.data:
In the Matter of C.B., et al. No. 586A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 13, 2006. R. Kent Harrell, Burgaw, for Guardian Ad Litem. Regina Floyd-Davis, for Pender County DSS. Sofie Hosford, for Brinson.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 13th day of December 2006 by Respondent to Amend Notice of Appeal:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 13th day of December 2006."
